text: Alice Moretti (19 June 1921 â€“ 6 February 2022) was a Swiss politician. She was a member of the Free Democratic Party of Switzerland. Moretti was on the Grand Council of Ticino from 1971 to 1987. She was born in Melide, Switzerland. Moretti died in Paradiso, Switzerland on 6 February 2022 at the age of 100. == References == Category:1921 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swiss politicians Category:Swiss centenarians Category:People from Ticino
title: Alice Moretti
